nodes.text: Star Wars: The Ultimate Soundtrack Edition

Star Wars: The Ultimate Soundtrack Edition is a CD set release of all six Star Wars original soundtracks. The set also includes a bonus CD containing interviews with Harrison Ford and John Williams, the Star Wars: A Musical Journey DVD, a fold-out poster, and three collectible stickers. Sony Classical announced on September 25, 2015 that the set would be released on January 8, 2016.
